name: Zagorec: Path to the Home
description:
Zagorec: Path to the Home is an adventure game which requires coordination and strategy. Master the movement of a drunk character, walk or run over many obstacles and experience the power of alcohol in first person.

Features
  • Run from bottle of black wine
  • Experience drunkenness in its full power
  • Feel the rush to get to the glass of fine white wine
Gameplay

Controlling your character is going to feel drunk just like in real life. Main character is going to be pushed and tossed around the map. While trying to go through the map you are going to feel high disortion of your vision because of drunkenness you are going through. You are being chased by bottle of black wine which is your worst nightmare. Your job is to get to the glass of fine white wine which represents your home and salvation.

Controls
  • WASD for basic player movement
  • Shift for running and space bar for jumping
  • Mouse for camera control
Credits

Lead programmer/Game Designer/Level Designer: Ante Tavra

UI: Marko Čičak

Special thanks to our mentor Cwekii <3
